name: reflexg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wb(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s1)))))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s1)))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s1)))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Two ways of saying a relation is reflexive over its domain and range. (Contributed by RP, 4-Aug-2020.)
